name: Rushed Alpha v0.2
description:
What is Rushed?

Rushed is a fast paced game where you have to avoid the enemies and collect the coins. With over 30 levels, it has a lot of replayability. Play for just 5 minutes or for hours and hours!

Alpha Version

Download the alpha version of Rushed, a move and dodge style game. It will be in early development for a few months so it has lots of bugs and glitches. We are looking for beta testers to help improve the game. Please contact us at games2playstudios@gmail.com

Bug Fixes
  • Added Load/Save Settings Functionality
  • Fixed The Desktop Icon Not Showing Issue
Known Bugs
  • Changing Resolutions shows some buttons from other menus. 
  • Pause Menu Pops Up When Resuming the game while in settings menu.
Features (RC)

This game features:

- Fast paced gameplay

- Powerups

- 30+ Levels (Release)

- & Much More!

Thanks for playing this game!
